snippet: A major assault on the Islamic State group's self-proclaimed capital of Raqqa is expected to begin in the coming weeks, but various military forces eyeing the northern Syrian city are bitterly divided....

headline.main: Lillard Scores 33 as Trail Blazers Beat Thunder 114-109
headline.print_headline: Lillard Scores 33 as Trail Blazers Beat Thunder 114-109

lead_paragraph: A major assault on the Islamic State group's self-proclaimed capital of Raqqa is expected to begin in the coming weeks, but various military forces eyeing the northern Syrian city are bitterly divided.
